title: Prayer to Saint Agnes
prayer:
Saint Agnes youthful bride of Christ
guard our purity and courage
help young hearts to love Jesus first
and witness to the Gospel

title: Prayer to Saint Aloysius Gonzaga
prayer:
Saint Aloysius model of youthful purity
defend young people from temptation
teach us to seek heavenly things
and serve the sick with love

title: Prayer to Saint Alphonsus Liguori
prayer:
Saint Alphonsus zealous preacher of moral truth
kindle in us love for the Redeemer
help us trust Gods mercy
and persevere in prayer

title: Prayer to Saint Ambrose
prayer:
Saint Ambrose fearless bishop
teacher of Augustine and defender of truth
help our leaders speak with courage
and sing with joy in Christ

title: Prayer to Saint Andre Bessette
prayer:
Brother Andre friend of Saint Joseph
you welcomed the sick with compassion
obtain healing for those who suffer
and strong trust in Saint Joseph's care

title: Prayer to Saint Andrew
prayer:
Saint Andrew first called apostle
lead us quickly to follow Christ
help us bring others to the Lord
and remain faithful to the cross

title: Prayer to Saint Andrew Kim Taegon
prayer:
Saint Andrew Kim and Korean martyrs
brave witnesses to Christ
help us endure hardship for the Gospel
and remain faithful to the end

title: Prayer to Saint Angela Merici
prayer:
Saint Angela educator of girls in faith
help us form hearts in virtue
grant wisdom to teachers and parents
and zeal for Christian education

title: Prayer to Saint Anne
prayer:
Good Saint Anne mother of Our Lady
watch over parents and grandparents
help us nurture faith in the home
and lead children to Jesus

title: Prayer to Saint Anselm
prayer:
Faith seeking understanding O Saint Anselm
lead us to question in humility
may our minds rise to God
and our hearts rest in belief

title: Prayer to Saint Anthony of Padua
prayer:
Gentle Saint Anthony helper of the lost
you showed love for God by serving the poor
please help me find what is lost in body or soul
lead me always to the peace of Christ

title: Prayer to Saint Athanasius
prayer:
Saint Athanasius champion of the Incarnation
guard us from error concerning Christ
give us boldness to defend the faith
and love for the Word made flesh

title: Prayer to Saint Augustine
prayer:
You have made us for Yourself O Lord
and our hearts are restless until they rest in You
Saint Augustine pray that we may seek truth
and find our rest in the love of God

title: Prayer to Saint Augustine Zhao Rong
prayer:
Saint Augustine Zhao Rong and Chinese martyrs
united in suffering for Christ
pray for the Church in Asia
and for courage in witness

title: Prayer to Saint Basil the Great
prayer:
Saint Basil teacher of right belief
strengthen communities in charity and prayer
help us defend the divinity of the Spirit
and care for the poor

title: Prayer to Saint Bede the Venerable
prayer:
Saint Bede scholar monk and historian
teach us to unite study with prayer
preserve the memory of Gods works
and build up the Church through learning

title: Prayer to Saint Benedict
prayer:
Glorious Saint Benedict model of holiness
intercede for our protection against evil
may your medal be a sign of faith and courage
keep us faithful to Christ in temptation

title: Prayer to Saint Bernadette
prayer:
Saint Bernadette humble child of Lourdes
you welcomed Our Lady with trust and simplicity
help us to follow Mary to Jesus
and to be faithful in prayer and penance

title: Prayer to Saint Bonaventure
prayer:
Seraphic Doctor Saint Bonaventure
enlighten our minds with wisdom
may learning lead us to love
and love lead us to God

title: Prayer to Saint Boniface
prayer:
Saint Boniface apostle to Germany
fearless missionary to pagan lands
grant us daring love for evangelization
and fidelity to the Church

title: Prayer to Saint Brigid of Ireland
prayer:
Saint Brigid flame of charity
enlarge our hearts to welcome the stranger
teach us generosity to the poor
and zeal for the Gospel

title: Prayer to Saint Camillus de Lellis
prayer:
Saint Camillus patron of the sick
you saw Christ in the suffering
inspire doctors nurses and caregivers
to serve with compassion and faith

title: Prayer to Saint Catherine Labouré
prayer:
Saint Catherine recipient of the Miraculous Medal
teach us confidence in Marys intercession
may the medal be a sign of grace
and draw souls to her Son

title: Prayer to Saint Catherine of Siena
prayer:
Saint Catherine fearless lover of the Church
inflame our hearts with zeal for truth
help us to love the wounds of Christ in the poor
and to live in holy obedience to God

title: Prayer to Saint Cecilia
prayer:
Saint Cecilia patron of sacred music
fill our hearts with songs of praise
may our lives be a hymn to God
and our worship pure and joyful

title: Prayer to Saint Charles Borromeo
prayer:
Saint Charles reformer of clergy and catechesis
strengthen bishops and teachers
help us live the Gospel with integrity
and renew the Church in holiness

title: Prayer to Saint Charles Garnier
prayer:
Saint Charles Garnier missionary and martyr
you brought Christ to indigenous peoples
bless all evangelizing cultures with respect
and grant unity in Christ

title: Prayer to Saint Charles Lwanga
prayer:
Saint Charles Lwanga and Ugandan martyrs
guardians of purity and faith
intercede for African youth
and strengthen us against sin

title: Prayer to Saint Christopher
prayer:
Saint Christopher bearer of Christ
protect us on our journeys
help us carry Christ to others
and arrive safely at our destination

title: Prayer to Saint Clare of Assisi
prayer:
Saint Clare mirror of poverty and purity
fix our gaze on Christ
help us choose simplicity of life
and radiant faith in Gods providence

title: Prayer to Saint Clare of Montefalco
prayer:
Saint Clare who bore the cross in your heart
help us meditate on Christs passion
plant His cross within our souls
and live in sacrificial love

title: Prayer to Saint Conrad of Parzham
prayer:
Saint Conrad humble porter of hospitality
teach us kindness to every visitor
may we welcome Christ in all who knock
and serve with hidden joy

title: Prayer to Saint Cyril of Alexandria
prayer:
Saint Cyril guardian of Mary Mother of God
defend us from error about the Incarnation
may we honor the Theotokos with love
and confess Christ true God and true man

title: Prayer to Saint Damien of Molokai
prayer:
Saint Damien missionary to the forgotten
you gave yourself to those cast aside
help us reach the outcast and suffering
with the healing love of Christ

title: Prayer to Saint Dominic
prayer:
Saint Dominic preacher of the Holy Rosary
fill us with love of the Word made flesh
may we contemplate truth and share it with charity
bring souls to Christ through Mary

title: Prayer to Saint Dymphna
prayer:
Saint Dymphna helper of those with mental illness
bring calm to troubled minds
comfort the brokenhearted
and intercede for healing and hope

title: Prayer to Saint Edith Stein
prayer:
Saint Teresa Benedicta of the Cross
philosopher martyr and Carmelite
help us unite reason and faith
and offer our lives in love

title: Prayer to Saint Elizabeth Ann Seton
prayer:
Saint Elizabeth Ann Seton mother teacher saint
teach us to love with generous hearts
help us to serve Christ in children and families
and to trust Divine Providence

title: Prayer to Saint Elizabeth of Hungary
prayer:
Saint Elizabeth generous princess of the poor
teach us to share bread and mercy
may charity transform our lives
and reveal Christ in the hungry

title: Prayer to Saint Ephrem the Syrian
prayer:
Saint Ephrem harp of the Spirit
fill our hearts with songs of praise
teach us poetry that leads to God
and humility in doctrine

title: Prayer to Saint Faustina Kowalska
prayer:
Saint Faustina apostle of Divine Mercy
help us trust in Jesus Mercy
teach us to say Jesus I trust in You
and show mercy to others

title: Prayer to Saint Frances Xavier Cabrini
prayer:
Saint Frances Cabrini missionary to immigrants
comfort those far from home
help us build communities of welcome
and trust the Sacred Heart

title: Prayer to Saint Francis Xavier
prayer:
Saint Francis Xavier missionary of the East
inflame our hearts with apostolic zeal
send us to the ends of the earth
to proclaim Jesus Christ

title: Prayer to Saint Francis de Sales
prayer:
Saint Francis de Sales gentle spiritual guide
teach us holiness in daily duties
may our words be seasoned with charity
and our hearts rest in Gods will

title: Prayer to Saint Francis of Assisi
prayer:
Lord make me an instrument of your peace
where there is hatred let me sow love
where there is injury pardon
where there is doubt faith
where there is despair hope
where there is darkness light
where there is sadness joy

title: Prayer to Saint Gabriel the Archangel
prayer:
Saint Gabriel messenger of the Incarnation
announce to our hearts the coming of the Lord
help us to say yes with Mary
and proclaim the good news with joy

title: Prayer to Saint Gertrude the Great
prayer:
Saint Gertrude mystic of the Sacred Heart
draw us into the burning love of Jesus
may our prayer embrace all souls
and offer reparation in love

title: Prayer to Saint Gianna Molla
prayer:
Saint Gianna holy physician and mother
you chose life at great cost
pray for families and unborn children
and for courage to defend life

title: Prayer to Saint Gregory Nazianzen
prayer:
Saint Gregory voice of Trinitarian faith
inspire preachers and theologians
may our speech about God be humble and true
and lead souls to worship

title: Prayer to Saint Gregory the Great
prayer:
Saint Gregory shepherd pope and servant
guide pastors to lead with humility
renew liturgy and evangelization
and protect the flock of Christ

title: Prayer to Saint Hildegard of Bingen
prayer:
Saint Hildegard prophetess of creation
open our eyes to the greening power of God
may art music and science praise the Lord
and heal the wounds of sin

title: Prayer to Saint Hubert
prayer:
Saint Hubert patron of hunters
teach us reverence for Gods creation
guide all who enter the wilderness
and keep them safe and just

title: Prayer to Saint Ignatius of Antioch
prayer:
Saint Ignatius bearer of God
you longed to be the wheat of Christ
give us courage to embrace the cross
and unity with the Church

title: Prayer to Saint Ignatius of Loyola
prayer:
Take Lord receive all my liberty
my memory my understanding and my will
all that I have you have given me
to you O Lord I return it
give me only your love and your grace
that is enough for me

title: Prayer to Saint Ignatius of Santhià
prayer:
Humble Capuchin confessor Saint Ignatius
you healed hearts in the confessional
obtain for us repentance and peace
and trust in Gods mercy

title: Prayer to Saint Irenaeus
prayer:
Saint Irenaeus defender of apostolic faith
guide us to unity in truth
may the glory of God be man fully alive
and man alive be the vision of God

title: Prayer to Saint Isaac Jogues
prayer:
Saint Isaac Jogues whose hands were wounded
yet you offered Mass again
grant perseverance in ministry
and courage in danger

title: Prayer to Saint Isidore the Farmer
prayer:
Saint Isidore humble worker of the soil
bless those who labor on the land
grant fruitful harvests and grateful hearts
and draw us to pray while we work

title: Prayer to Saint James the Greater
prayer:
Saint James pilgrim apostle
walk with us on the road of faith
help us to persevere through hardship
until we reach the kingdom

title: Prayer to Saint Jean de Brébeuf
prayer:
Saint Jean de Brebeuf apostle to the Huron
inflame us with missionary love
help us learn the language of hearts
and suffer all for Christ

title: Prayer to Saint Jerome
prayer:
Saint Jerome lover of Scripture
ignite in us hunger for the Word of God
may we read meditate and live the Gospel
and find Christ in the text

title: Prayer to Saint Joachim
prayer:
Saint Joachim father of Our Lady
intercede for fathers and families
grant us faithful leadership in the faith
and love that reflects Gods own

title: Prayer to Saint Joachim and Saint Anne for Grandparents
prayer:
Holy grandparents of Jesus
watch over all grandparents today
bless their wisdom and faith
and keep families united in love

title: Prayer to Saint Joan of Arc
prayer:
Saint Joan brave witness to Gods call
strengthen our hearts in trials and battles
help us to follow conscience with courage
and to fight for justice under Christs banner

title: Prayer to Saint John Bosco
prayer:
Saint John Bosco father and teacher of youth
lead young people to Christ with joy
bless educators and parents
and keep our youth safe in faith

title: Prayer to Saint John Chrysostom
prayer:
Golden mouthed preacher of grace
Saint John Chrysostom pray for eloquence in truth
may our words build up the Church
and our lives match our preaching

title: Prayer to Saint John Fisher
prayer:
Saint John Fisher bishop and martyr
guardian of sacramental marriage
pray for bishops and families
to remain faithful to the Gospel

title: Prayer to Saint John Henry Newman
prayer:
Saint John Henry Newman seeker of truth
lead minds from shadow to reality
may our hearts speak to hearts
and our conscience rest in God

title: Prayer to Saint John Neumann
prayer:
Saint John Neumann missionary bishop
builder of schools for the young
bless Catholic education
and strengthen faith in our communities

title: Prayer to Saint John Paul II
prayer:
Saint John Paul II fearless witness to hope
pray that we open wide the doors to Christ
strengthen the young in faith
and renew the world in love

title: Prayer to Saint John Vianney
prayer:
Saint John Vianney holy pastor of souls
you gave your life to reconcile sinners
pray for our priests and parishes
that we may hunger for the sacraments

title: Prayer to Saint John XXIII
prayer:
Good Pope John man of humility and humor
pray for renewal in the Church
help us open our hearts to the Spirit
and walk the path of peace

title: Prayer to Saint John of the Cross
prayer:
Saint John of the Cross mystic of the dark night
guide us through dryness to union with God
may we cling to faith when all feels lost
and find love in the silence

title: Prayer to Saint John the Apostle
prayer:
Beloved disciple who rested on the Heart of Jesus
teach us love that casts out fear
may we remain in Him who is Love
and bear witness to the Word made flesh

title: Prayer to Saint Jose Sanchez del Rio
prayer:
Blessed youth who cried Viva Cristo Rey
grant us courage in the face of oppression
strengthen young believers
and keep our faith unshaken

title: Prayer to Saint Joseph
prayer:
O Glorious Saint Joseph faithful guardian of Jesus and Mary
with you we raise our hearts to implore your powerful help
obtain for us from the Heart of Jesus grace in every need
guide our families in work virtue and peace

title: Prayer to Saint Josephine Bakhita
prayer:
Saint Josephine Bakhita freed daughter of God
you forgave your captors and found Christ
intercede for victims of human trafficking
and teach us the power of forgiveness

title: Prayer to Saint Juan Diego
prayer:
Saint Juan Diego messenger of Our Lady
teach us trust in Marys care
help us bring her message of love
to all her children

title: Prayer to Saint Jude
prayer:
Most holy Apostle Saint Jude friend of Jesus
patron of difficult and desperate causes
intercede for me in my present need
bring visible and speedy help that I may praise God

title: Prayer to Saint Junípero Serra
prayer:
Saint Junipero Serra missionary of the New World
proclaim Always forward never back
guide evangelizers and catechists
to bring Christ to new frontiers

title: Prayer to Saint Justin Martyr
prayer:
Saint Justin philosopher for Christ
defender of the faith in reason
help us witness to the Gospel in dialogue
and seek truth wherever it is found

title: Prayer to Saint Kateri Tekakwitha
prayer:
Saint Kateri Lily of the Mohawks
in simplicity and purity you followed Christ
help us to live the Gospel in our culture
and to love Jesus above all things

title: Prayer to Saint Kizito
prayer:
Saint Kizito young martyr of Uganda
teach children courage in Christ
help us love Jesus more than life
and stand firm in truth

title: Prayer to Saint Lawrence
prayer:
Saint Lawrence joyful deacon and martyr
you saw the poor as the treasures of the Church
help us to love with generous hearts
and laugh even in trials

title: Prayer to Saint Leo the Great
prayer:
Saint Leo pope and doctor
you proclaimed Christ one divine Person
strengthen us in right belief
and courage in leadership

title: Prayer to Saint Louise de Marillac
prayer:
Saint Louise cofounder with Saint Vincent
guide all who serve the poor in charity
help us combine compassion with organization
and see dignity in every person

title: Prayer to Saint Lucy
prayer:
Saint Lucy virgin and martyr of light
intercede for those with eye troubles
bring the light of Christ to our darkness
and strengthen us in witness

title: Prayer to Saint Margaret Mary Alacoque
prayer:
Saint Margaret Mary apostle of the Sacred Heart
inflame our hearts with Christs burning love
teach us reparation and trust
and console the Heart of Jesus

title: Prayer to Saint Marguerite Bourgeoys
prayer:
Saint Marguerite pioneer teacher of New France
open paths for evangelization and education
help us form children in faith
and trust Gods providence

title: Prayer to Saint Maria Goretti
prayer:
Saint Maria Goretti model of purity and forgiveness
help us to guard our hearts
grant us courage to forgive those who hurt us
and to live as children of light

title: Prayer to Saint Martin de Porres
prayer:
Saint Martin friend of the poor and animals
your charity embraced all peoples
teach us humility and kindness
and service without prejudice

title: Prayer to Saint Maximilian Kolbe
prayer:
Saint Maximilian knight of the Immaculata
you gave your life out of love
help us entrust ourselves to Mary
and love without counting the cost

title: Prayer to Saint Michael the Archangel
prayer:
Saint Michael the Archangel defend us in battle
be our protection against the wickedness and snares of the devil
may God rebuke him we humbly pray
and do you O Prince of the Heavenly Host
by the power of God thrust into hell Satan and all evil spirits

title: Prayer to Saint Monica
prayer:
Saint Monica faithful mother in tears and prayer
you never ceased interceding for your son
pray for our loved ones far from the faith
may they return to God through grace

title: Prayer to Saint Nicholas
prayer:
Saint Nicholas generous bishop
bless children and all who give in secret
teach us joyful generosity
and care for those in need

title: Prayer to Saint Nicholas Pieck and Companions
prayer:
Martyrs of Gorcum steadfast in the Eucharist
strengthen us to confess the Real Presence
unite Christians in truth and love
and crown us with fidelity

title: Prayer to Saint Nicholas of Flüe
prayer:
Saint Nicholas peacemaker of Switzerland
bring unity to divided homes and nations
teach us prayerful discernment
and love of Gods will

title: Prayer to Saint Oliver Plunkett
prayer:
Saint Oliver martyr for the faith in Ireland
intercede for reconciliation and peace
help us love even our enemies
and stand firm in hope

title: Prayer to Saint Oscar Romero
prayer:
Saint Oscar Romero voice for the voiceless
you proclaimed justice and mercy
help us defend human dignity
and bear prophetic witness

title: Prayer to Saint Padre Pio
prayer:
Saint Pio humble bearer of the wounds of Christ
teach us to embrace the cross
pray that we may be faithful in suffering
and find mercy at the foot of the altar

title: Prayer to Saint Patrick
prayer:
Christ with me Christ before me Christ behind me
Christ in me Christ beneath me Christ above me
Christ on my right Christ on my left
Christ in every heart that loves me
Christ in every eye that sees me

title: Prayer to Saint Paul
prayer:
Saint Paul apostle to the nations
set our hearts on fire with zeal
may we preach Christ crucified and risen
and run the race to the finish

title: Prayer to Saint Paul Miki and Companions
prayer:
Saint Paul Miki and Japanese martyrs
you sang the Te Deum from the cross
strengthen persecuted Christians
and fill us with unshakable faith

title: Prayer to Saint Peregrine
prayer:
Saint Peregrine patron of cancer patients
you endured illness with trust in God
pray for healing for the sick
and courage for all who suffer

title: Prayer to Saint Peter
prayer:
Saint Peter rock and shepherd
strengthen the Church in faith
pray that we may trust Christs mercy
and stand firm when we fall

title: Prayer to Saint Philip Neri
prayer:
Saint Philip joyful apostle of Rome
fill our hearts with holy cheerfulness
teach us humility and love for the Eucharist
draw young hearts to Christ

title: Prayer to Saint Philomena
prayer:
Saint Philomena wonder worker
pure martyr beloved of the youth
intercede for us in our needs
and obtain perseverance in virtue

title: Prayer to Saint Pius X
prayer:
Saint Pius X lover of the Eucharist
encourage frequent Holy Communion
renew our devotion at the altar
and guard the purity of doctrine

title: Prayer to Saint Polycarp
prayer:
Saint Polycarp faithful bishop and martyr
you served Christ for many years
grant us perseverance to the end
and fidelity in trial

title: Prayer to Saint Raphael the Archangel
prayer:
Saint Raphael healer and guide
lead us on safe journeys
bring healing to body mind and spirit
and guide us to Gods peace

title: Prayer to Saint Rita of Cascia
prayer:
Saint Rita advocate in impossible causes
you knew suffering and divine consolation
intercede in our hopeless situations
and obtain peace in our homes

title: Prayer to Saint Rose of Lima
prayer:
Saint Rose radiant in penance and prayer
help us love the hidden life with Christ
console the lonely and forgotten
and offer our sacrifices in love

title: Prayer to Saint Scholastica
prayer:
Saint Scholastica sister in spirit to Saint Benedict
your prayer moved heaven to rain
teach us loving persistence in prayer
and union with God above all

title: Prayer to Saint Sebastian
prayer:
Saint Sebastian soldier and martyr
strengthen athletes and all who strive
grant courage in persecution
and endurance in hardship

title: Prayer to Saint Stephen
prayer:
Saint Stephen first martyr
teach us to forgive our persecutors
fill us with the Spirit and courage
to proclaim Christ boldly

title: Prayer to Saint Teresa Benedicta and Saint Maximilian
prayer:
Saints of Auschwitz witnesses of love
teach us to conquer hatred with charity
pray for healing of nations
and triumph of mercy

title: Prayer to Saint Teresa of Avila
prayer:
Let nothing disturb you let nothing frighten you
all things are passing God never changes
patience obtains all things
whoever has God lacks nothing God alone suffices

title: Prayer to Saint Teresa of Calcutta
prayer:
Saint Teresa of Calcutta servant of the poorest
teach us to see Jesus in the distressing disguise of the poor
grant us hearts that love until it hurts
and hands ready to serve

title: Prayer to Saint Therese of Lisieux
prayer:
Little Flower of Jesus shower roses of grace upon us
teach us your little way of trust and love
help me to do small things with great love
and to glorify God in everything

title: Prayer to Saint Thomas Aquinas
prayer:
Saint Thomas Angelic Doctor of the Church
help us seek truth with humility
teach us to love the Eucharist deeply
and to unite study with prayer

title: Prayer to Saint Thomas Becket
prayer:
Saint Thomas Becket defender of the Church
you shed your blood for her freedom
protect religious liberty
and strengthen us in witness

title: Prayer to Saint Thomas More
prayer:
Saint Thomas More patron of statesmen
you served God above kings
grant integrity in public life
and courage to follow conscience

title: Prayer to Saint Thomas the Apostle
prayer:
Saint Thomas who touched the wounds of Christ
increase our faith when we doubt
help us to cry out My Lord and my God
and to believe without seeing

title: Prayer to Saint Vincent Ferrer
prayer:
Saint Vincent fiery preacher of repentance
awaken our hearts to conversion
prepare us for the coming of the Lord
and strengthen us in hope

title: Prayer to Saint Vincent de Paul
prayer:
Saint Vincent apostle of charity
inflame us with love for the poor
may we serve Christ in the hungry and homeless
and bring comfort to those in need

title: Prayer to Saint Zélie and Saint Louis Martin
prayer:
Holy parents of Saint Therese
guide families in love and simplicity
teach us prayer in the home
and trust in Gods providence
